product_entries.full_product_description: Supply, installation, testing and commissioning of aspiration detector with CMOS imager combined with multiple photodiode for reliable very early warning in a wide range of environments with minimal nuisance alarms. The detector should have 4 pipe inlet and min 100m pipelength support per inlet.The detector should have Smart on-board filter retains dust count and remaining filter life for predictable maintenance& coverage area of min 5000 Sq.
product_entries.size: pipe inlet: 4, pipelength support per inlet: min 100m, coverage area: min 5000 Sq.

Supply, erection, testing & commissioning of 6 Watt Ceiling mounted Speakers
Providing & fixing ARMOURED CABLING complete with lugs, laying and termination of both ends.

Supply, installation, testing and commissioning of aspiration detector with CMOS imager combined with multiple photodiode for reliable very early warning in a wide range of environments with minimal nuisance alarms. The detector should have 4 pipe inlet and min 100m pipelength support per inlet.The detector should have Smart on-board filter retains dust count and remaining filter life for predictable maintenance& coverage area of min 5000 Sq.
Supply,Installation,Testing & Commissioning of  UL/VDS listed CPVC Pipe 25 mm Dia & Pipe Accessories for the Aspiration detection.
Providing & fixing 600Watt Amplifier with necessary accessories.
Supply, fabrication, erection & testing of GI CABLE TRAYS FOR LAYING ALL TYPE OF CABLES AS INDICATED ABOVE INCLUDING ALL NECESSARY STRUCTURAL SUPPORTS.

Supply, erection and testing of  heavy grade(class-C) pipes  conforming to IS-1239 / IS-3589 including all fittings viz. tees, elbows, reducers, union,  flanges, rubber gaskets,  GI  nuts  bolts,  washer and structural steels for pipe supports. Hanger support with anchor fasteners and clamps shall be supplied to fix the pipes on ceiling wall etc. including supporting/fixing the pipe on floor / wall /ceiling with clamps,   hangers (using anchor fastners) as per specification. Cutting of floors, walls etc and making it good after erection of pipes shall be of vendor's scope. Necessary painting with 2 coats of primer and 2 coats of synthetic enamel paints to be done and supply of paints shall be with vendor's scope.
